description: When it's time to pump iron, no one has the muscle likes Paul Wagner and Vince Ferelli do. These guys are serious body builders. But with all that testosterone always flowing, these two are also seriously horny all the time, so it's not a surprise that the other day, when Vince walked in on Paul while he was bench pressing, things got hot and heavy really fast.Not only do the two hunks swap blowjobs, but they also fuck each other. Yeah, hot!Enjoy!
title: Workout Buddies
